code: import React from'react';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Textform(props){const handleupclick=()=>{let mytext=text.toUpperCase();settext(mytext);};const handleloclick=()=>{let mytext=text.toLowerCase();settext(mytext);};const handleonchange=event=>{settext(event.target.value);};const[text,settext]=useState('');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3  my-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"exampleFormControlTextarea1",className:"form-label",children:props.heading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"form-control",id:"exampleFormControlTextarea1",placeholder:"Enter your text here",onChange:handleonchange,value:text,rows:"8"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:handleupclick,class:"btn btn-primary",children:"Change to Upper Case"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:handleloclick,class:"btn btn-primary mx-2",children:"Change to Lower Case"})]});}
